titles.title: A bill to extend the temporary duty-free treatment for certain types of hosiery knitting machines and certain types of knitting needles; and to temporarily exempt certain other types of hosiery knitting machines and certain types of knitting needles.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.
Executive Comment Requested from State, Treasury, Commerce, Labor, ITC, USTR.

bill.summary: 2/4/1987--Introduced. Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to extend, through December 31, 1992, the duty-free treatment of single cylinder fine gauge hosiery knitting machines and double cylinder jacquard hosiery knitting machines. Grants duty-free treatment, through December 31, 1992, of all other double-cylinder hosiery knitting machines. Extends, through December 31, 1992, the duty-free treatment of double-headed latch needles. Grants duty-free treatment, through December 31, 1992, of all other latch needles and other type needles for knitting machines.
